title: Solving for $$x$$ When the Square Root is $$0$$
text: The first step is to set the square root to greater than or equal to to zero and solve for $$x$$.

title: Answer
text: Now, we will exclude any number greater than $$7$$ from the domain. The answers are all real numbers less than or equal to $$7$$, or $$(-\infty,7]$$.
